headline: Applied Materials, Broadcom, Lam Research, Western Digital, and Allegro MicroSystems Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after the semiconductor sector tumbled as a 'buy the rumor, sell the news' event unfolded around AI-chip leader Nvidia, despite its strong earnings report.

headline: Nishant Sinha Joins Atomera as Head of Marketing to Drive Strategy and Growth in Advanced Semiconductor Materials
summary: LOS GATOS, Calif., February 26, 2026--Atomera Incorporated (NASDAQ:ATOM), a semiconductor materials and technology licensing company, today announced the appointment of Nishant Sinha as its new Head of Marketing. The addition reflects the company’s continued focus on accelerating growth amid the AI fueled semiconductor ecosystem.

headline: The AI spending boom is creating winners beyond the 'Mag 7.' Why one sector could see big gains.
summary: While the market has long been obsessed with chipmakers such as Nvidia and AMD, Morgan Stanley argues that the real value is now migrating to semiconductor equipment makers — the companies that build the multibillion-dollar machines used in fabrication plants.

headline: Lam Research Resets Technology Path With CEA Leti Deal And Boise Bet
summary: Lam Research announced a new partnership with research institute CEA-Leti focused on next generation specialty semiconductor technology. The company is reshaping its leadership team alongside this technology collaboration. Lam is expanding its US footprint with a new facility in Boise, Idaho, centered on advanced memory chip manufacturing near key customer Micron. These moves come as Lam Research (NasdaqGS: LRCX) trades at $249.48, with the stock up 3.9% over the past week and 11.9% over...
